Insert.Data: All closed state types (default: not viewable).
State type for merged tickets (default: not viewable).
Ticket is pending for agent reminder.
Ticket is pending for automatic close.
Ticket is pending for automatic close.

Dear <OTRS_CUSTOMER_REALNAME>,
Thank you for your request.

Your Ticket-Team
<OTRS_Agent_UserFirstname> <OTRS_Agent_UserLastname>
-- Super Support - Waterford Business Park 5201 Blue Lagoon Drive - 8th Floor & 9th Floor - Miami, 33126 USA Email: hot@example.com - Web: http://www.example.com/ --
Follow ups after closed(+|-) possible. Ticket will be reopen.
Follow ups after closed(+|-) not possible. No new ticket will be created.
Follow ups after closed(+|-) not possible. A new ticket will be created..
Some test answer to show how a standard response can be used.
Auto replay which will be sent out after a new ticket has been created.
Auto reject which will be sent out after a follow up has been rejected (in case queue follow up option is "reject").
Auto follow up is sent out after a added follow up has been received for a ticket (in case queue follow up option is "possible").
Auto reply/new ticket which will be sent out after a follow up has been rejected and a new ticket has been created (in case queue follow up option is "new ticket").
Auto remove will be sent out after a customer removed th request by it self.
default reply (after new ticket has been created)

This is a demo text which is send to every inquery. It could contain something like:
Thanks for your e-mail. A new ticket has been created.
You wrote: <OTRS_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your e-mail will be answered by a human asap
Have fun with OTRS! :-)
Your OTRS Team
default reject (after follow up and rejected of a closed ticket)

Your previous ticket is closed.
-- Your follow up has been rejected. --
Please create a new ticket.
Your OTRS Team
default follow up (after a ticket follow up has been added)

Thanks for your follow up e-mail
You wrote: <OTRS_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your e-mail will be answered by a human asap.
Have fun with OTRS!
Your OTRS Team
default reject/new ticket created (after closed follow up with new ticket creation)

Your previous ticket is closed.
-- A new ticket has been created for you. --
You wrote: <OTRS_CUSTOMER_EMAIL[6]>
Your e-mail will be answered by a human asap.
Have fun with OTRS!
Your OTRS Team

Welcome!
thank you for installing OTRS.
You will find updates and patches at http://otrs.org/. Online documentation is available at http://doc.otrs.org/. You can also take advantage of our mailing lists http://lists.otrs.org/.
((enjoy))
Your OTRS Team -- Communication with success!
